channel.title: About on Jörn Alexander Quent's notebook
channel.description: Recent content in About on Jörn Alexander Quent's notebook

item.title: About my open notebook
item.description: Note (10/12/2018): This is outdated. See here for current approach. I have just finished uploading old diary entries, which gives me the opportunity to reflect on what I have done so far and to get a bit more meta on the whole topic with this entry, which is the first one I am actually going to publish at the end of my (working) day. Some of the previous entries are quite short and initially weren’t written for the general public.
